PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-17792002-10-240,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval to enter into TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with three Indian Band Councils (the SKIDEGATE, the SPALLUMCHEEN and the WHITECAP DAKOTA FIRST NATION), whereby the Government of Canada, on behalf of those Bands, will collect a tax on sales of alcoholic beverages, fuel and tobacco products that occur on their reserves.
Attachments
